item.title: Transform Your Chromebook into a Docker Dev Machine with Virtual Disks
item.description: Hello everyone! Recently, I had an old, unused Chromebook lying around. Thinking it’s a shame to let it gather dust, I got the idea to turn it into a simple Docker development server. After all, using a lightweight machine for lightweight services makes many things much more convenient.
